meanings.definition: Not related by blood or marriage.
meanings.sent1: The neighbors are nonfamily friends who live down the street.
meanings.sent2: She prefers nonfamily gatherings with her close friends.
meanings.sent3: The nonfamily picnic was a fun way to bond with new acquaintances.
meanings.sent4: The nonfamily reunion felt like a gathering of long-lost friends.
meanings.sent5: The nonfamily relationship was built on trust and mutual respect.

meanings.definition: Not part of a family unit.
meanings.sent1: The orphan found comfort in his nonfamily caretakers.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the nonfamily atmosphere of her workplace.
meanings.sent3: The nonfamily pet brought joy and companionship to the household.
meanings.sent4: The nonfamily team worked together seamlessly to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent5: The nonfamily bond between roommates was strong and supportive.
